oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Chris DeStefano - 2017-05-13
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Chris DeStefano from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 13, 2017. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chris DeStefano;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Introduction of Chris DeStefano in progress by Abi Tapia / (01:21) Opening comments by Chris DeStefano and tells story about songwriting with Carrie Underwood / (05:31) Performs Good Girl / (09:58) Talks about writing the next song / (12:) Performs From The Ground Up / (17:44) Talks about co-writing songs / (19:32) Performs Kick The Dust Up / (23:22) Answers question about co-writing / (25:26) Answers question about what influences his songwriting / (26:24) Answers question does he feel he's been successful / (27:44) Answers question about his musical background / (28:31) Answers question about what has he not done that he want to do career wise / (29:33) Answers question about being a songwriter compared to a performer / (30:27) Answers question about what his desert island record would be / (31:00) Performs Your Smiling Face / (33:32) Talks about the live James Taylor disc / (34:25) Answers question about writing in Nashville / (35:02) Introduces the next song /

(37:11) Performs Something In The Water / (41:49) Answers question about his songs / (43:10) Answers question about songwriters becoming artists and writing songs for songwriting artists / (44:29) Answers question about working with Kelly Clarkson / (45:58) Answers question about performing new songs in public /(46:36) Closing comments from Abi Tapia and Chris / (46:53) Walk-out music / (55:14) FILE END.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: DeStefano, Chris; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
